column4: Shows boss would like to have come (e.g. “He couldn’t make it today” rather than “He’s not here”)
column6: Gives reason for boss’s absence (e.g. “He had unexpected business come up”)
column8: Expresses that you have been put in charge (e.g. “I am in charge of the US component of the coalition” rather than “I am taking his place”)
